entries.title: Lee Harvey Oswald, the CIA, and LSD: New Clues in Newly Declassified Documents
entries.description:
An unredacted memo adds depth to our understanding of the CIA's response to allegations that Oswald worked with the spy agency.

The post Lee Harvey Oswald, the CIA, and LSD: New Clues in Newly Declassified Documents appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Who Cares Whether Elon Musk Is CEO of Twitter? He OWNS It.
entries.description:
In capitalism, managers aren’t in charge. They’re well-compensated employees.

The post Who Cares Whether Elon Musk Is CEO of Twitter? He OWNS It. appeared first on The Intercept.
